Question
========
  
The following fitted regression equation is provided:$\hat{y}=5+0.75x_{1}-2.5x_{2}+3.5x_{1}x_{2}$. What does the regression equation look like when $x_{1}=6$?


Answerlist
----------
* $\hat{y}=28-2.5x_{2}$.
* $\hat{y}=9.5+18.5x_{2}$.
* $\hat{y}=5+25.5x_{1}-2.5x_{2}$.
* $\hat{y}=5.75+1x_{2}$.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
